mapper.select: select count (*) from treview where user_num=#{userNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE TREVIEW SET p_title =#{title}, CONTENT =#{content}, STISF=#{stisf} WHERE PST_NUM = #{pstNum}
mapper.select:
SELECT PST.PST_NUM , PST.BRD_CODE , PST.P_TITLE , PST.USER_NUM , PST.P_REGDATE , PST.P_UPDATEDATE , PST.STISF , PST.CONTENT , J.ACM_NUM , J.BOOK_NUM , J.ACM_NAME , J.CHECKIN_DATE , J.CHECKOUT_DATE
FROM ( SELECT A.ACM_NUM , B.BOOK_NUM , A.ACM_NAME , B.CHECKIN_DATE , B.CHECKOUT_DATE FROM TBOOKING B, TACM A, TROM R WHERE B.ROM_NUM=R.ROM_NUM AND R.ACM_NUM=A.ACM_NUM AND B.BOOK_STATUS='RS_STT_AC' )J,
TREVIEW PST
WHERE J.BOOK_NUM = pst.BOOK_NUM(+) AND J.book_num = #{bookNum}
ORDER BY J.checkin_Date

SELECT PST.PST_NUM , PST.BRD_CODE , PST.P_TITLE , J.USER_NUM , PST.P_REGDATE , PST.P_UPDATEDATE , PST.STISF , PST.CONTENT , J.ACM_NUM , J.BOOK_NUM , J.ACM_NAME , J.CHECKIN_DATE , J.CHECKOUT_DATE, J.ACM_PURL , J.ACM_PNAME
FROM ( SELECT A.ACM_NUM , A.ACM_PURL , A.ACM_PNAME , B.BOOK_NUM , A.ACM_NAME , B.CHECKIN_DATE , B.CHECKOUT_DATE, B.USER_NUM FROM TBOOKING B, TACM A, TROM R WHERE B.ROM_NUM=R.ROM_NUM AND R.ACM_NUM=A.ACM_NUM AND B.BOOK_STATUS='RS_STT_AC' )J,
TREVIEW PST
WHERE J.BOOK_NUM = pst.BOOK_NUM(+) AND J.user_num =#{loginUser}
ORDER BY J.checkin_Date

SELECT PST.PST_NUM , PST.BRD_CODE , PST.P_TITLE , PST.USER_NUM , PST.P_REGDATE , PST.P_UPDATEDATE , PST.STISF , PST.CONTENT , J.ACM_NUM , J.BOOK_NUM , J.ACM_NAME , J.CHECKIN_DATE , J.CHECKOUT_DATE
FROM ( SELECT A.ACM_NUM , B.BOOK_NUM , A.ACM_NAME , B.CHECKIN_DATE , B.CHECKOUT_DATE FROM TBOOKING B, TACM A, TROM R WHERE B.ROM_NUM=R.ROM_NUM AND R.ACM_NUM=A.ACM_NUM AND B.BOOK_STATUS='RS_STT_AC' )J,
